agents.description: Agents are custom AI assistants designed with a specific set of instructions tailored to perform particular tasks or solve particular problems.
agents.no-agents: No agents found. Create your first agent.

not-found.title: Page not found
not-found.description: We couldn't find the page you were looking for. The page might have been moved, deleted, or never existed.
not-found.action: Check the URL or navigate back to the homepage.

profile.title: Profile
profile.avatar-disclaimer: You can change your avatar on

custom-instructions.label: What preferences should the chat consider in responses?
custom-instructions.placeholder: eg. I primarily use this chat for coding questions, so please keep responses concise and to the point

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Integrations extend the functionality of the chat. You can connect your favorite tools and services to El Chat. You can use these integrations to give the chat access to your own data sources, such as Notion or more coming soon.
integrations.privacy-disclaimer: We don't store any of your data, nor do we have access to it. We only provide it to the model to generate the response you see in the chat.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: Set your prefered language for the chat experience.
